title: [PCD] Pixelmon Mod Wiki 翻译 | Item
author: lovekasumi
txt_content:
本帖最后由 lulu456u 于 2018-2-14 00:15 编辑 

失误草稿贴发出来了……
精灵球Cherish Ball——贵重球A Cherish Ball is a type of Poké Ball that has a 1× catch rate, the same as a normal Poké Ball. It can be obtained as a tier 2 special drop.  Cherish Balls can also be used to make Poké Gifts.贵重球是一种捕获率与普通精灵球相同，捕获率为1×的精灵球。它可以作为2级的特殊掉落物。贵重球也可以用来制作宝可梦礼物。
Dive Ball——潜水球A Dive Ball is a somewhat different Poké Ball that has a 3.5× catch rate on Pokémon that are in water. It can be obtained by crafting it, buying from a shopkeeper, or as a tier 1 special drop.潜水球是一种与普通精灵球稍微不同的精灵球，它在水中具有3.5×的捕获率。它可以通过合成来获得，也可以作为1级的特殊掉落物。
Dusk Ball——黑暗球A Dusk Ball is a Poké Ball that has a 3.5× catch rate in dark places. It can be obtained by crafting it, buying from a shopkeeper, or as a tier 1 special drop,  If it is currently dusk or night, the Dusk Ball will have its increased catch rate. Otherwise, the location of the Pokémon to be caught must meet the following requirements for the Dusk Ball to have a 3.5× catch rate:  The Pokémon must be located at a height level of 64 or lower. The Pokémon must be in a place with a light level of 14 or lower (i.e. not in direct sunlight). Rain in an area of direct sunlight will not trigger the Dusk Ball's effects. Snow in an area of direct sunlight will trigger the Dusk Ball's effects.
黑暗球是一种在昏暗的地方有3.5×捕获率的精灵球。它可以通过合成、购买或作为1级特殊掉落物来获得。如果是在黄昏和夜晚，它的捕获率将会增加。
另外，如果满足这些条件，它的捕获率也会增加。
1.宝可梦必须在高度等于或低于64的地方。
2.宝可梦所在地的光照程度必须等于或低于14（即不在阳光直射下）
3.在阳光直射的情况下，下雨和下雪都不会触发黑暗球的效果。
Fast Ball——速度球A Fast Ball is a Poké Ball that has a 4× catch rate on Pokémon that have a base Speed of 100 or more. It can be obtained by crafting it, buying from a shopkeeper, or as a tier 1 special drop,  A list of Pokémon that the Fast Ball gives an increased catch rate on can be found here.速度球是一种对基础速度超过100的宝可梦有4×捕获率的精灵球。它可以通过合成、购买和作为1级特殊掉落物来获得。速度球可以作用的宝可梦列表见下方。
Friend Ball——友友球A Friend Ball is a type of Poké Ball that sets a captured Pokémon's base happiness to 200. This effect does not occur if a Friend Ball is inherited by a Pokémon through breeding. Friend Balls have the same catch rates as normal Poké Balls. It can be obtained by crafting it, buying from a shopkeeper, or as a tier 1 special drop.友友球是一种可以设置已被捕获的宝可梦的亲密度到200的精灵球。如果它接收到的宝可梦是通过繁殖产生的，那么这个效果就不会发生。友友球有和普通精灵球相等的捕获率。它可以通过合成、购买或作为1级特殊掉落物来获得。
Great Ball——超级球A Great Ball is a type of Poké Ball categorized by the red and blue coloring on its upper lid. It has a 1.5× the catch rate of a normal Poké Ball. It can be obtained by crafting it, buying from a shopkeeper, or as a tier 1 special drop.超级球是一种上盖上游红色和蓝色分布的精灵球。它有1.5×的捕获率。它可以通过合成、购买和作为1级特殊掉落物来获得。
Heal Ball——治愈球A Heal Ball is a remedial Poké Ball that restores the caught Pokémon's HP and eliminates any status problem upon capture. It can be obtained by crafting it, buying from a shopkeeper, or as a tier 1 special drop.治愈球是一种可以恢复宝可梦的球。它将会在捕捉时治疗宝可梦的生命值，并消除状态对它们的影响。它可以通过合成、购买，或作为1级特殊掉落物获得。
Heavy Ball——沉重球A Heavy Ball is a Poké Ball for catching very heavy Pokémon. It can be obtained by crafting it, buying from a shopkeeper, or as a tier 1 special drop,  Unlike most Poké Balls, the Heavy Ball's catch rate modifier is additive rather than multiplicative. The catch rate modifier for Heavy Balls based on Pokémon weight is as follows:Weight                Modifier<204.8 kg                 -20204.8-307.2 kg        +20307.2-409.6 kg        +30>409.6 kg                +40沉重球是一种用于捕捉很重的宝可梦的精灵球。它可以通过合成、购买，或作为1级特殊掉落物来获得。不同于大多数精灵球，沉重球的捕获率调整是增加而不是倍乘。捕获率随捕获目标重量的变化如下：重量                        变化量<204.8 千克                 -20204.8-307.2 千克        +20307.2-409.6 千克        +30>409.6 千克                +40
Level Ball——等级球A Level Ball is a somewhat different Poké Ball which becomes more effective when used on Pokémon at a lower level than the lead Pokémon. It can be obtained by crafting it, buying from a shopkeeper, or as a tier 1 special drop,  The catch rate for the Level Ball is:  1× if the lead Pokémon is the same level or a lower level than the wild Pokémon. 2× if the lead Pokémon is above the level and less than double the level of the wild Pokémon. 4× if the lead Pokémon is between double and quadruple the level of the wild Pokémon. 8× if the lead Pokémon is quadruple the level or more of the wild Pokémon.等级球是一种与普通精灵球稍有不同的精灵球，它对比你的首选宝可梦等级低的宝可梦的捕捉率会更高。它可以通过合成、购买或作为1级特殊掉落物来获得。等级球的捕获率如下：1×当你的首选宝可梦比目标宝可梦的等级低或与其相同时2×当你的首选宝可梦的等级比目标宝可梦高，但未达到2倍时4×当你的首选宝可梦的等级比目标宝可梦高2~4倍时8×当你的首选宝可梦的等级比目标宝可梦高超过4倍时
Love Ball——甜蜜球A Love Ball is a Poké Ball that has an 8× catch rate on Pokémon of both the same species and opposite gender as the player's Pokémon. It can be obtained by crafting it, buying from a shopkeeper, or as a tier 1 special drop, It is also a drop from wild Granbull.甜蜜球是一种对与你的宝可梦相同种类且性别相反的宝可梦有8×捕获率的精灵球。它可以通过合成、购买，或作为1级特殊掉落物来获得。它也有5%的几率从野生的布卢皇身上掉落。
Lure Ball——诱饵球A Lure Ball is a type of Poké Ball that has a 3× catch rate on Pokémon encountered by fishing. It can be obtained by crafting it, buying from a shopkeeper, or as a tier 1 special drop.诱饵球是一种对钓鱼时遇到的宝可梦有3×捕获率的精灵球。它可以通过合成、购买或作为1级特殊掉落物来获得。
Luxury Ball——豪华球A Luxury Ball is a comfortable Poké Ball that makes a caught wild Pokémon quickly grow friendly. It can be obtained by crafting it, buying from a shopkeeper, or as a tier 1 special drop,  A Luxury Ball grants an extra +1 happiness to the multiple ways of obtaining happiness, although it does not affect events that lower happiness. The effects of the Luxury Ball stack with the effects of a Soothe Bell.豪华球是一个舒适的精灵球，让被捕获的野生宝可梦迅速地变得更加友好。它可以通过合成、购买，或是作为1级特殊掉落物来获得。豪华球会让提升亲密度的事件额外增加1亲密度，虽然他并不影响降低亲密度的事情。豪华球的效果会覆盖安抚之铃的效果。


Master Ball——大师球The Master Ball is a type of Poké Ball that will always catch the Pokémon it is used on (unless the Pokémon cannot be caught, like a boss Pokémon or another trainer's Pokémon). Unlike all other Poké Balls, Master Balls have no chance of breaking if thrown against a block. A Master Ball can be obtained as a tier 3 special drop, or as a possible drop from legendary and ultimate boss Pokémon. Master Balls cannot be crafted.大师球是一种必定能抓住宝可梦的精灵球（除非目标宝可梦不能被抓获，例如一个boss宝可梦或者其他人的宝可梦）。与其他的精灵球不同，大师球在贴墙投掷时没有几率被打破。大师球可以通过作为3级特殊掉落物获得，或者作为一个传说boss或最终boss的掉落物来掉落。大师球不能被合成。（其实大师球以前是可以合成的）
Moon Ball——月亮球A Moon Ball has a 4x catch rate on Pokémon that evolve with a Moon Stone or belong to evolutionary families of the former. It can be obtained by crafting it, buying from a shopkeeper, or as a tier 1 special drop.月亮球对于使用月亮石进化的或者它进化前的形态的宝可梦有4×的捕获率。它可以通过合成、购买，或作为1级特殊掉落物来获得。
Nest Ball——巢穴球A Nest Ball is a somewhat different Poké Ball that works especially well on weaker Pokémon in the wild. The Nest Ball's catch rate is based on the formula:  41-Pokémon's level 10 ×, with a minimum catch rate of 1×. It can be obtained by crafting it, buying from a shopkeeper, or as a tier 1 special drop.巢穴球是一种与普通精灵球略有不同的精灵球，它对弱小的野生宝可梦尤其有效。捕获率计算公式：41-宝可梦等级 10×，最小为1×的捕获率。它可以通过合成、购买或作为1级特殊掉落物获得。
Net Ball——捕网球A Net Ball is a somewhat different Poké Ball that has a 3× catch rate on Water and Bug-type Pokémon. It can be obtained by crafting it, buying from a shopkeeper, or as a tier 1 special drop.
捕网球是一种与普通精灵球略有不同的精灵球，它对昆虫系宝可梦有3×的捕获率。它可以通过合成、购买，或作为1级特殊掉落物来获得。


Poké Ball——精灵球This article is about the regular Poké Ball.  A regular Poké Ball is the most basic type of Poké Ball. It has a 1× catch rate on all Pokémon. It can be obtained by crafting it, buying from a shopkeeper, or as a tier 1 special drop.这篇文章是关于通常的精灵球。精灵球是精灵球中最普通的一种（迷之别扭）。它对所有宝可梦有1×的捕获率。它可以通过合成、购买，或作为1级特殊掉落物来获得。
Relugar Poké balls are also used to craft an old rod and parts of trade machine.精灵球也被用于制作一个破旧钓竿和贸易机器的零件。精灵球有5%的几率从顽皮雷弹和霹雳电球身上掉落。
Premier Ball——纪念球A Premier Ball is a Poké Ball that has been specially made to commemorate an event of some sort. Premier Balls are unique in that they have particle effects when thrown. This is purely aesthetic–they have the same catch rate as normal Poké Balls. It can be obtained by crafting it, buying from a shopkeeper, or as a tier 1 special drop.
纪念球是一种专为纪念某些事件而制作的精灵球。它是独特的，因为它抛出时将会产生粒子特效。这纯粹是为了美感——因为它有着和普通精灵球一样的捕获率。它可以通过制作、购买，或作为1级特殊掉落物来获得。


Quick Ball——先机球A Quick Ball is a type of Poké Ball that has a 5× catch rate if used on the first turn of a wild Pokémon battle, having a 1× catch rate otherwise. The Pokémon must be engaged in battle to take advantage of the increased catch rate; throwing a Quick Ball at a Pokémon outside of battle will result in a 1× catch rate. It can be obtained by crafting it, buying from a shopkeeper, or as a tier 1 special drop.
先机球是一种在战斗的第一回合使用时具有5×捕获率的精灵球，但它在其他时候（例如战斗的其它回合或战斗外）只有1×的捕获率。它可以通过合成、购买，或作为1级特殊掉落物来获得。


Repeat Ball——重复球A Repeat Ball is a somewhat different Poké Ball that has a 3× catch rate on Pokémon species that were previously caught or otherwise owned by the Trainer. It can be obtained by crafting it, buying from a shopkeeper, or as a tier 1 special drop.
重复球是一种对已经被抓过或训练师已经拥有的种类的宝可梦有3×的捕获率的精灵球。它可以通过合成、购买，或作为1级特殊掉落物来获得。


Safari Ball——狩猎球A Safari Ball is a ball that has a 1.5× catch rate if used in a Plains biome.Otherwise, it has a catch rate of 1×.狩猎球是一种在平原生态区有1.5×捕获率的精灵球。在其他地方，它只有1×捕获率。
Sport Ball——竞赛球A Sport Ball is a type of Poké Ball that has a 1.5× catch rate on Bug-type Pokémon. It has a 1× catch rate otherwise. It can be obtained by crafting it, buying from a shopkeeper, or as a tier 1 special drop.竞赛球是一种对昆虫系宝可梦有1.5×捕获率的精灵球。它在其他情况下只有1×捕获率。它可以通过合成、购买，或作为1级特殊掉落物来获得。
Timer Ball——计时球A Timer Ball is a somewhat different Poké Ball that becomes progressively better the more turns there are in a battle. Every turn, starting at 1×, a Timer Ball will increase in effectiveness by 0.3× (additive), with a maximum catch rate of 4× (11th turn and onwards). It can be obtained by crafting it, buying from a shopkeeper, or as a tier 1 special drop.计时球是一种与普通精灵球有所不同的精灵球，它在随着回合数变多将会越来越有效。它的捕获率从1×开始，每一个回合都会增加0.3×，直到达到上线4×（从第11个回合起）。它可以通过合成、购买，或作为1级特殊掉落物来获得。
Ultra Ball——高级球An Ultra Ball has a catch rate of 2× the normal Poké Ball's catch rate. It is more effective than a Great Ball. It can be obtained by crafting it, buying from a shopkeeper, or as a tier 1 special drop.高级球是一种有2×捕获率的精灵球。它比超级球更加有效。它可以通过合成、购买或作为1级特殊掉落物来获得。



精灵球零件（该部分合成表在上面找）
Aluminum Base——铝制精灵球球座 和 Aluminum Disc——铝制精灵球球座-未成形An aluminum base is created by placing an aluminum disc on an anvil (by using the anvil when holding a disc), then by hitting the anvil with a hammer on the anvil. Eventually, the disc will turn into an aluminum base, which can be re-obtained either by continuing to hammer or by using the anvil. Aluminum bases are functionally equivalent to iron bases and can be used to make almost every type of Poké Ball.铝制精灵球球座是通过把一个铝制精灵球球座-未成形放在铁砧上（在拿着球座时使用铁砧），然后在铁砧上用锤子敲击铁砧。这样，一个铝制精灵球球座将会成型。你可以通过使用铁砧，或继续敲击来重新让它变成未成形的球座。铝制精灵球球座的功效与精灵球球座一致，都可以用来制作绝大多数的精灵球。
Dive Ball Disc——潜水球球盖-未成形 和 Dive Ball Lid——潜水球球盖A Dive Ball disc is used with an anvil and a hammer to make a Dive Ball lid. It can then be used to make a Dive Ball.潜水球球盖-未成形被用于使用铁砧和锤子来制作潜水球球盖。然后，它就可以被使用来制作一个潜水球了。
Dusk Ball Disc——黑暗球球盖-未成形 和 Dusk Ball Lid——黑暗球球盖A Dusk Ball disc is used with an anvil and a hammer to make a Dusk Ball lid. It can then be used to make a Dusk Ball.黑暗球球盖-未成形被用于使用铁砧和锤子来制作黑暗球球盖。然后，它就可以被使用来制作一个黑暗球了。
Fast Ball Disc——速度球球盖-未成形 和 Fast Ball Lid——速度球球盖A Fast Ball disc is used with an anvil and a hammer to make a Fast Ball lid. It can then be used to make a Fast Ball.速度球球盖-未成形被用于使用铁砧和锤子来制作速度球球盖。然后，它就可以被使用来制作一个速度球了。
Friend Ball Disc——友友球球盖-未成形 和 Friend Ball Lid——友友球球盖A Friend Ball disc is used with an anvil and a hammer to make a Friend Ball lid. It can then be used to make a Friend Ball.友友球球盖-未成形被用于使用铁砧和锤子来制作友友球球盖。然后，它就可以被使用来制作一个友友球了。
Great Ball Disc——超级球球盖-未成形 和 Great Ball Lid——超级球球盖A Great Ball disc is used with an anvil and a hammer to make a Great Ball lid. It can then be used to make a Great Ball.超级球球盖-未成形被用于使用铁砧和锤子来制作超级球球盖。然后，它就可以被使用来制作一个超级球了。
Heal Ball Disc——治愈球球盖-未成形 和 Heal Ball Lid——治愈球球盖A Heal Ball disc is used with an anvil and a hammer to make a Heal Ball lid. It can then be used to make a Heal Ball.治愈球球盖-未成形被用于使用铁砧和锤子来制作治愈球球盖。然后，它就可以被使用来制作一个治愈球了。
Heavy Ball Disc——沉重球球盖-未成形 和 Heavy Ball Lid——沉重球球盖A Heavy Ball disc is used with an anvil and a hammer to make a Heavy Ball lid. It can then be used to make a Heavy Ball.沉重球球盖-未成形被用于使用铁砧和锤子来制作沉重球球盖。然后，它就可以被使用来制作一个沉重球了。
Iron Base——精灵球球座 和 Iron Disc——精灵球球座-未成形An aluminum base is created by placing an aluminum disc on an anvil (by using the anvil when holding a disc), then by hitting the anvil with a hammer on the anvil. Eventually, the disc will turn into an aluminum base, which can be re-obtained either by continuing to hammer or by using the anvil. Aluminum bases are functionally equivalent to iron bases and can be used to make almost every type of Poké Ball.精灵球球座是通过把一个精灵球球座-未成形放在铁砧上（在拿着球座时使用铁砧），然后在铁砧上用锤子敲击铁砧。这样，一个精灵球球座将会成型。你可以通过使用铁砧，或继续敲击来重新让它变成未成形的球座。精灵球球座的功效与铝制精灵球球座一致，都可以用来制作绝大多数的精灵球。
Level Ball Disc——等级球球盖-未成形 和 Level Ball Lid——等级球球盖A Level Ball disc is used with an anvil and a hammer to make a Level Ball lid. It can then be used to make a Level Ball.等级球球盖-未成形被用于使用铁砧和锤子来制作等级球球盖。然后，它就可以被使用来制作一个等级球了。
Love Ball Disc——甜蜜球球盖-未成形 和 Love Ball Lid——甜蜜球球盖A Love Ball disc is used with an anvil and a hammer to make a Love Ball lid. It can then be used to make a Love Ball.甜蜜球球盖-未成形被用于使用铁砧和锤子来制作甜蜜球球盖。然后，它就可以被使用来制作一个甜蜜球了。
Lure Ball Disc——诱饵球球盖-未成形 和 Lure Ball Lid——诱饵球球盖A Lure Ball disc is used with an anvil and a hammer to make a Lure Ball lid. It can then be used to make a Lure Ball.诱饵球球盖-未成形被用于使用铁砧和锤子来制作诱饵球球盖。然后，它就可以被使用来制作一个诱饵球了。
Luxury Ball Disc——豪华球球盖-未成形 和 Luxury Ball Lid——豪华球球盖
A Luxury Ball disc is used with an anvil and a hammer to make a Luxury Ball lid. It can then be used to make a Luxury Ball.豪华球球盖-未成形被用于使用铁砧和锤子来制作豪华球球盖。然后，它就可以被使用来制作一个豪华球了。
Moon Ball Disc——月亮球球盖-未成形 和 Moon Ball Lid——月亮球球盖
A Moon Ball disc is used with an anvil and a hammer to make a Moon Ball lid. It can then be used to make a Moon Ball.月亮球球盖-未成形被用于使用铁砧和锤子来制作月亮球球盖。然后，它就可以被使用来制作一个月亮球了。
Nest Ball Disc——巢穴球球盖-未成形 和 Nest Ball Lid——巢穴球球盖A Nest Ball disc is used with an anvil and a hammer to make a Nest Ball lid. It can then be used to make a Nest Ball.巢穴球球盖-未成形被用于使用铁砧和锤子来制作巢穴球球盖。然后，它就可以被使用来制作一个巢穴球了。
Net Ball Disc——捕网球球盖-未成形 和 Net Ball Lid——捕网球球盖
A Net Ball disc is used with an anvil and a hammer to make a Net Ball lid. It can then be used to make a Net Ball.捕网球球盖-未成形被用于使用铁砧和锤子来制作捕网球球盖。然后，它就可以被使用来制作一个捕网球了。
Poké Ball Disc——精灵球球盖-未成形 和 Poké Ball Lid——精灵球球盖A Poké Ball disc is used with an anvil and a hammer to make a Poké Ball lid. It can then be used to make a Poké Ball.精灵球球盖-未成形被用于使用铁砧和锤子来制作精灵球球盖。然后，它就可以被使用来制作一个精灵球了。
Premier Ball Disc——纪念球球盖-未成形 和 Premier Ball Lid——纪念球球盖A Premier Ball disc is used with an anvil and a hammer to make a Premier Ball lid. It can then be used to make a Premier Ball.纪念球球盖-未成形被用于使用铁砧和锤子来制作纪念球球盖。然后，它就可以被使用来制作一个纪念球了。
Quick Ball Disc——先机球球盖-未成形 和 Quick Ball Lid——先机球球盖A Quick Ball disc is used with an anvil and a hammer to make a Quick Ball lid. It can then be used to make a Quick Ball.先机球球盖-未成形被用于使用铁砧和锤子来制作先机球球盖。然后，它就可以被使用来制作一个先机球了。
Repeat Ball Disc——重复球球盖-未成形 和 Repeat Ball Lid——重复球球盖
A Repeat Ball disc is used with an anvil and a hammer to make a Repeat Ball lid. It can then be used to make a Repeat Ball.重复球球盖-未成形被用于使用铁砧和锤子来制作重复球球盖。然后，它就可以被使用来制作一个重复球了。
Safari Ball Disc——狩猎球球盖-未成形 和 Safari Ball Lid——狩猎球球盖
A Safari Ball disc is used with an anvil and a hammer to make a Safari Ball lid. It can then be used to make a Safari Ball.狩猎球球盖-未成形被用于使用铁砧和锤子来制作狩猎球球盖。然后，它就可以被使用来制作一个狩猎球了。
Sport Ball Disc——竞赛球球盖-未成形 和 Sport Ball Lid——竞赛球球盖
A Sport Ball disc is used with an anvil and a hammer to make a Sport Ball lid. It can then be used to make a Sport Ball.竞赛球球盖-未成形被用于使用铁砧和锤子来制作竞赛球球盖。然后，它就可以被使用来制作一个竞赛球了。
Timer Ball Disc——计时球球盖-未成形 和 Timer Ball  Lid——计时球球盖
A Timer Ball disc is used with an anvil and a hammer to make a Timer Ball lid. It can then be used to make a Timer Ball.计时球球盖-未成形被用于使用铁砧和锤子来制作计时球球盖。然后，它就可以被使用来制作一个计时球了。
Ultra Ball Disc——高级球球盖-未成形 和 Ultra Ball Lid——高级球球盖
A Ultra Ball disc is used with an anvil and a hammer to make a Ultra Ball lid. It can then be used to make a Ultra Ball.高级球球盖-未成形被用于使用铁砧和锤子来制作高级球球盖。然后，它就可以被使用来制作一个高级球了。


资源
Aluminum Ingot——铝锭The aluminum ingot is a new resource added to Minecraft with the Pixelmon mod. Aluminum ingots can be obtained by smelting bauxite ore, from Forage, or as drops from wild Pokémon. Aluminum ingots can be used to craft certain items. Aluminum can also can be placed on an anvil and hammered into aluminum plates, which are used to craft other items. Move tutors sometimes require aluminum ingots as payment for their services.
铝锭是一种被Pixelmon mod添加至我的世界的新矿物。它可以通过搜寻、冶炼矿物和作为野生宝可梦的掉落物获得。他可以用于制造某些物品，也可以被放在铁砧上锤打成铝板来制造另一些物品。移动的导师们有时候需要铝锭来作为他们服务的报酬。
Aluminum Plate——铝板Aluminum plates are used to craft several items.  To make an aluminium plate, an aluminium ingot must be placed on an anvil and a hammer must be used on it. 
铝板被用于制作几种物品。想要制作铝板，你必须把铝锭放在一个铁砧上然后用锤子敲打它。（合成图见各物品）
Amethyst——紫水晶Amethyst is a material that can be obtained by smelting amethyst ore or as drops from certain Pokémon. It can be used to make amethyst tools and Rocket armor. It can also be made into amethyst blocks for storage or decorational purposes. Move tutors sometimes require amethysts as payment for their services.
紫水晶是一种可以通过熔炼矿石或作为某些宝可梦的掉落物的矿石。它可以被用于制作一些紫水晶工具和火箭队服饰。它也可以制成紫水晶块用于装饰或存储。有时移动的导师们会需要一些紫水晶作为他们服务的报酬。
Amethyst Block——紫水晶块An amethyst block is a type of block made from nine amethysts. Its only purposes are decoration and storage of amethysts. When placed, it requires a pickaxe to be retrieved.紫水晶块是一种由9块紫水晶构成的方块。它只被用来装饰和储存紫水晶。当它被放置出来后，需要用镐子来挖下来。
Amethyst Ore——紫水晶矿石Amethyst ore is a type of ore that contains amethysts. It can be found within stone at height 64 and below, spawning in veins of up to 3 ore. Any pickaxe can be used to mine the ore, causing it to drop in its ore form. An amethyst will be produced if the ore is smelted.紫水晶矿石是一种含有紫水晶的矿石。它可以在高度64或更低的地方找到，每个矿脉生成三个或以上。任何镐子都可以用于挖掘这种矿石，使其掉落。如果你冶炼矿石，一个紫水晶将会生成。
Bauxite Ore——铝矿Bauxite is a new ore introduced in Pixelmon. Its main usage is the manufacturing of several Pixelmon machines.  Bauxite can be found within stone at height levels between 30 and 60, in veins of up to eight blocks. It is also a drop from certain wild Pokémon.  Bauxite ore requires at least an iron pickaxe to break. Due to this, it is possible to tell bauxite from iron by trying to break it with a stone pickaxe, as bauxite can't be broken with it while iron can. The color is slightly different as well; bauxite ore is a little more dull than iron ore.铝矿是一种Pixelmon mod新引进的矿石。它主要的作用是制造一些Pixelmon机器。铝矿可以在高度30~60的地方找到，每个矿脉生成8个。它也会从一些野生宝可梦处掉落。铝矿至少需要铁镐才能打破。由此，用石镐试图打破它是一种区分铝矿和铁矿的方式。当铁矿可以被打破的时候，铝矿并不能被打破。颜色也有一些区别，铝矿比铁矿稍微暗一些。
Black Apricorn——黑球果 Cooked Black Apricorn——熟的黑球果A Black Apricorn is an Apricorn that can be cooked into a cooked Black Apricorn. This cooked Apricorn can be used to make Poké Ball discs for Dusk Balls, Level Balls, Luxury Balls, Moon Balls, Net Balls, Repeat Balls, Timer Balls, and Ultra Balls.黑球果是一种可以被烹饪的球果，烹饪后会成为熟的黑球果。这种熟球果可以被用于制作未成形的精灵球球盖（黄昏球、等级球、豪华球、月亮球、捕网球、重复球、计时球和高级球）。
Blue Apricorn——蓝球果 Cooked Blue Apricorn——熟的蓝球果A Blue Apricorn is an Apricorn that turns into a cooked Blue Apricorn when cooked in a furnace. This cooked Apricorn can be used to make Poké Ball discs for Great Balls, Moon Balls, Heavy Balls, Net Balls, and Dive Balls. Uncooked Blue Apricorns can also be used to craft certain decorative blocks.蓝球果在熔炉中烹饪后会变成熟的蓝球果。熟的蓝球果可以被用于制作未成形的精灵球球盖（超级球、月亮球、沉重球、捕网球和潜水球）。蓝球果也可以被用于制作一些装饰方块。
Green Apricorn——绿球果 Cooked Green Apricorn——熟的绿球果A Green Apricorn is an Apricorn that turns into a cooked Green Apricorn when cooked in a furnace. This cooked Apricorn can be used to make Poké Ball discs for Dusk Balls, Friend Balls, Nest Balls, and Safari Balls. Uncooked Green Apricorns can also be used to craft certain decorative blocks.绿球果在熔炉中烹饪后会变成熟的蓝球果。熟的绿球果可以被用于制作未成形的精灵球球盖（黑暗球、友友球、巢穴球和狩猎球）。绿球果也可以被用于制作一些装饰方块。
Pink Apricorn——粉球果 Cooked Pink Apricorn——熟的粉球果A Pink Apricorn is an Apricorn that can be cooked into a cooked Pink Apricorn. This cooked Apricorn can be used to make Poké Ball discs for Love Balls, Dive Balls, and Heal Balls. Uncooked Pink Apricorns can also be used to craft pink clocks.粉球果可以烹饪成熟的粉球果。熟的粉球果可以用来制作未成形的精灵球球盖（甜蜜球、潜水球和治愈球）。粉球果也可以制作粉色闹钟。
Yellow Apricorn——黄球果 Cooked Yellow Apricorn——熟的黄球果A Yellow Apricorn is an Apricorn that can be cooked into a cooked Yellow Apricorn in a furnace. These cooked Yellow Apricorns can be used to make Poké Ball discs for Ultra Balls, Level Balls, Moon Balls, Friend Balls, Safari Balls, Fast Balls, and Nest Balls. Uncooked Yellow Apricorns are also used to craft certain decorative blocks.黄球果可以被烹饪成熟的黄球果。熟的黄球果可以用于制作高级球、等级球、月亮球、友友球、狩猎球、速度球和巢穴球的球盖。黄球果也可以用于制作一些装饰方块。
White Apricorn——白球果 Cooked White Apricorn——熟的白球果A White Apricorn is an Apricorn that turns into a cooked White Apricorn when cooked. These cooked Apricorns can be used to make the Poké Ball discs for Heal Balls, Luxury Balls, Premier Balls, and Timer Balls.白球果可以被烹饪成熟的白球果。熟的白球果可以用于制作治愈球、豪华球、纪念球和计时球的球盖。
Red Apricorn——红球果 Cooked Red Apricorn——熟的红球果Red Apricorns are Apricorns that are found on Red Apricorn trees. They can be cooked to make cooked Red Apricorns, which can then be used to craft Poké Ball discs for Poké Balls, Great Balls, Premier Balls, Timer Balls, Repeat Balls, Fast Balls, Level Balls, Friend Balls, and Luxury Balls. Uncooked Red Apricorns can also be used to craft certain decorative blocks.红球果可以在红球果树上找到。它们可以被烹饪成熟的红球果，用于制作精灵球、超级球、纪念球、计时球、重复球、速度球、等级球、友友球和豪华球的球盖。没有烹饪锅的红球果也可以用于制作一些装饰方块。
Crystal——水晶Crystal is a material that can be obtained by smelting crystal ore or as a drop from certain Pokémon. It can be used to make crystal tools, Plasma armor, and Neo Plasma armor. It can also be made into crystal blocks for storage or decorational purposes. Move tutors sometimes request crystals for their services.水晶是一种可以通过熔炼水晶矿或从某些特殊的宝可梦身上掉落获得的材料。它可以用来制作水晶工具、等离子团的盔甲和电浆团的盔甲。它也可以制成水晶块，用于装饰或存储。移动导师有时需要水晶作为他们服务的报酬。
Crystal Block——水晶块A crystal block is a type of block made from nine crystals. Its only purposes are decoration and storage of crystals. When placed, it requires a pickaxe to be retrieved.水晶块是一种用9个水晶制成的方块。它只被用于装饰和存储水晶。当被放置后，你需要一个镐子来挖掘它。
Crystal Ore——水晶矿石Crystal ore is a type of ore that contains crystals. It can be found within stone at height 64 and below, spawning in veins of up to 3 ore. Any pickaxe can be used to mine the ore, causing it to drop in its ore form. A crystal will be produced if the ore is smelted.水晶矿是一种含有水晶的矿石。你可以在64及以下的高度找到它，每个矿脉生成三个。任何镐子都可以用来挖掘它，让它掉落矿石本身。如果矿石被熔炼，将会生成水晶。
Dawn Stone Shard——觉醒之石碎片A Dawn Stone Shard is a type of shard that can be obtained from mining DawnDusk Ore at dawn. It is used to make Dawn Stones.觉醒之石碎片可以通过在黎明时分挖掘黎明/黑暗矿石来获得。它被用于制作觉醒之石。
DawnDusk Ore——觉醒之石/暗之石矿DawnDusk ore is a type of ore that can be mined with any pickaxe. If the time is either day or night, the ore looks like regular stone and yields cobblestone when mined. However, if the time is dawn, mining the ore will yield a Dawn Stone shard, while if the time is dusk, a Dusk Stone shard will be dropped when mining the ore. DawnDusk ore spawns in Plains, Sunflower Plains, Savanna, Savanna M, Savanna Plateau, and Savanna Plateau M biomes within stone at no more than 10 blocks under the surface.觉醒之石/暗之石矿是一种可以被任何镐子挖掘的矿石。在白天和晚上，这种矿石看起来就像是石头，挖掘时会掉落圆石。但如果是黄昏，将掉落暗之石；如果是黎明，则会掉落觉醒之石。这种矿石将会在Plains, Sunflower Plains, Savanna, Savanna M, Savanna Plateau, and Savanna Plateau M biomes地形生成，在地表10个方块内生成。
Fire Stone Ore——火之石矿Fire Stone ore is very rare type of ore found only around lava, whether in the Overworld or in the Nether. When mined, a Fire Stone ore yields one Fire Stone shard, nine of which will make a Fire Stone. A pickaxe is needed to successfully mine Fire Stone ore.火之石矿是一种很罕见的矿石，只会在岩浆附近被发现。（在主世界和下界都会生成）
Fire Stone Shard——火之石碎片Fire Stone shards are mined from Fire Stone ore, very rarely found beneath lava pools, on the roofs above lava flows or pools, and in the Nether. They can also be found by using Forage on lava with a Fire-type Pokémon, and as drops from certain wild Pokémon  Nine shards are required to make a Fire Stone.火之石碎片是通过火之石矿获得的。同时你也可以通过在岩浆附近搜寻火属性神奇宝贝，并通过野生神奇宝贝的掉落来获得。火之石需要9个火之石碎片来合成。
Leaf Stone Ore——叶之石矿Leaf Stone ore is an ore that drops a single Leaf Stone shard when mined with a pickaxe. When nine shards are obtained, they can be crafted into a Leaf Stone.  Leaf Stone ore can be found in all variants of forest and taiga biomes. The ore only spawns directly under leaves and within stone, causing it to be located underground but very close to the surface.通过镐子挖掘叶之石矿可以获得叶之石碎片。9个叶之石碎片可以合成一个叶之石。叶之石矿可以在森林和针叶林群落找到。他们只生成在葉子的正下方，在岩石中，非常靠近地表。
Leaf Stone Shard——叶之石碎片A Leaf Stone shard is a piece of a Leaf Stone, a stone used to evolve certain Grass-type Pokémon. A Leaf Stone shard can be obtained from a Leaf Stone ore, which can be found in the stone directly under leaves in forest biomes and requires a pickaxe to mine. Leaf Stone shards can also be obtained by using Forage on dirt or grass blocks with a Grass-type Pokémon.  Nine Leaf Stone shards are needed to craft a Leaf Stone.叶之石碎片是叶之石的一部分，叶之石可以用于金华一部分草系神奇宝贝。叶之石碎片可以通过叶之石矿获得。叶之石碎片也可以通过在泥土或草方块附近寻找草系神奇宝贝，并通过它们的掉落获得。9个叶之石碎片可以合成一个叶之石。
Shiny Stone Shard——光之石碎片A Shiny Stone shard is a type of shard that is used to make Shiny Stones. It can be obtained by using Forage on stone-based blocks with a Normal or Fairy-type Pokémon.光之石碎片是用来制作光之石的材料。它可以通过让精灵系或普通系宝可梦搜寻石基类方块来获得。
Water Stone Ore——水之石矿Water Stone ore can be found in deep water, such as Ocean biomes. It is easy to spot underwater as it emanates some light. When mined, a Water Stone ore yields one Water Stone shard, nine of which make a Water Stone. A pickaxe is needed to mine this ore.水之石矿可以在深水中被找到，例如在海洋生物群落中。因为它会发出光线，所以你能很容易地在水中找到它。当你挖掘它时，每个石矿将会掉落一块水之石碎片。挖掘它需要一把镐子。
Water Stone Shard——水之石碎片A Water Stone shard is a piece of a Water Stone, an evolution stone used to evolve certain Water-type Pokémon.  Water Stone shards are obtained from Water Stone ore, which can be found in deep water. The ore emits some light, making it easier to spot underwater. Water Stone shards can also be obtained by using Forage on water with Water-type Pokémon.  Nine shards are needed to craft one Water Stone.水之石碎片是水之石的一部分。水之石是某些水系宝可梦的进化石。水之石碎片可以通过深水下的水之石矿获得。矿石会发出光线，这样你可以更容易在水下找到它。水之石碎片也可以通过让水系宝可梦搜索水域来获得。合成一块水之石需要九个碎片。
Sun Stone Shard——日之石碎片A Sun Stone shard can be obtained by mining Sun Stone ore, as a drop from wild Solrock, or by using Forage on stone-based blocks with a Fairy or Fire-type Pokémon. However, Sun Stone ore does not spawn naturally, so Sun Stone shards can only be obtained legitimately from Forage and drops.  Nine Sun Stone shards can be crafted into a Sun Stone.挖掘日之石矿可以作为掉落物获得日之石碎片。同时，你也可以通过野生的太阳岩或搜寻石基上的火系宝可梦来获得它。然而，日之石矿并不会自然生成，你只能通过搜寻或击杀野生太阳岩来得到它。9个日之石碎片可以合成一个日之石。
Thunder Stone Ore——雷之石矿Thunder Stone Ore can be found within stone at heights of 74+. The high heights at which the ore spawns means that it is much more common in mountainous biomes such as Extreme Hills. When mined, it drops a Thunder Stone shard, several of which are needed to make Thunder Stones. A pickaxe is needed to mine this ore.你可以在74或更高的高度找到雷之石矿。也就是说，雷之石矿更多的在高山群落或极端的山地上被找到。挖掘时，雷之石矿将会掉落雷之石碎片，一些碎片可以合成雷之石。挖掘这种矿物需要镐子。
Thunder Stone Shard——雷之石碎片A Thunder Stone shard is a piece of a Thunder Stone, a stone used to evolve certain Electric-type Pokémon. It can be mined from Thunder Stone ore, found in places with stone at high heights such as Extreme Hills biomes. It can also be obtained as a drop from certain wild Pokémon or by using Forage on stone-based blocks with an Electric-type Pokémon. Nine Thunder Stone shards are needed to craft a Thunder Stone.雷之石碎片是雷之石（用于电系宝可梦的进化）的一部分。他可以通过可以在高处（例如高山生物群系）上被找到的雷之石矿获得。它也可以作为战胜某些野生宝可梦的战利品，或用一个电系宝可梦搜寻石基来获得。9个雷之石碎片可以合成一个雷之石。
Ruby Ore——红宝石矿Ruby ore is a type of ore that contains rubies. It can be found within stone at height 64 and below, spawning in veins of up to 3 ore. Any pickaxe can be used to mine the ore, causing it to drop in its ore form. A ruby will be produced if the ore is smelted.红宝石矿是一种含有红宝石的矿石。你可以在64或更低的高度找到它，每个矿系至少生成3个矿石。任何镐子都可以挖掘该矿石，并让其作为掉落物掉落。熔炼该矿石将会生成红宝石。
Ruby——红宝石Ruby is a material that can be obtained by smelting ruby ore or as a drop from certain Pokémon. It can be used to make ruby tools and Magma armor. It can also be made into ruby blocks for storage or decoration. Move tutors sometimes require rubies as payment for their services.红宝石是一种可以通过挖掘红宝石矿或作为某些宝可梦掉落物来获得的材料。它可以用于制作红宝石工具和火岩队护甲，或制作红宝石块及某些装饰方块。移动的导师有时需要红宝石作为报酬。
Ruby Block——红宝石块A ruby block is a type of block made from nine rubies. Its only purposes are decoration and storage of rubies. When placed, it requires a pickaxe to be retrieved.红宝石块是用9个红宝石合成的方块。它只用于装饰和储存红宝石。当它被放置后，你需要镐子来重新挖掘它。
Silicon——硅Silicon is a material that can be obtained by smelting Silicon ore, or as a drop from certain wild Pokémon. It can be used to craft certain items.硅是一种可以通过矿石和宝可梦掉落获得的材料。它可以用来制作某些物品。
Silicon Ore——硅矿石Silicon ore is a type of ore that contains silicon. It can be found within stone at height 64 and below, spawning in veins of up to 3 ore. Any pickaxe can be used to mine the ore, causing it to drop in its ore form. A piece of silicon will be produced if the ore is smelted.硅矿石可以在64或更低的高度被找到，任何镐子都可以用来挖掘该矿石。每个矿系至少生成3块矿石，熔炼该矿石将会产生硅。


工具/护甲
Aluminum tools——铝制工具Aluminum ingots can be crafted into the standard set of tools (axe, pickaxe, shovel, hoe, sword) along with the hammer introduced by Pixelmon. They are slightly inferior to iron tools, all having 201 durability (whereas iron tools have 251). Aluminum axes, pickaxes, and shovels break their respective blocks at the same speed as their iron counterparts, while all tools that deal more than half a heart of damage except for hammers (i.e., sword, axe, pickaxe, shovel) deal half a heart of damage less than their iron counterparts (e.g. an aluminum sword deals three hearts of damage per hit).铝锭可以被制成标准工具（斧、镐、铲、锄、剑），也可以被制成Pixelmon特有的锤。它们稍逊于铁制工具，都有201耐久（铁制工具有251耐久）。铝制的斧、镐、铲都和相同类型铁制工具具有相同的方块破坏速度，但造成的伤害比相同类型的铁制工具低半颗心（比如铝剑每次攻击造成3心伤害我怎么没看出来哪里低了）

replies.txt_content: _(:з」∠)_我这算是在挖坟吗，楼主写的好辛苦
